content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/demo-cas-server-web is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. I need to:
1. First, explore the repository structure to understand what we're working with
2. Check the current Maven configuration (pom.xml)
3. Update the Java version in pom.xml
4. Check for any code that might need updating for Java 17 compatibility
5. Run `mvn clean verify` with JDK 17 to ensure everything works

Let me start by exploring the repository structure.

	<modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
	<groupId>com.jadyer.demo</groupId>
	<artifactId>demo-cas-server-web</artifactId>
	<version>4.0.3</version>
	<packaging>war</packaging>

	<properties>
		<project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>

		<jsp.standard.version>1.1.2</jsp.standard.version>

		<mysql.driver.version>5.1.36</mysql.driver.version>
	</properties>

	<dependencyManagement>
		<dependencies>
			<!-- provided(provided外的依赖都定义在全局) -->

	<dependencies>

			<version>${jsp.jstl.version}</version>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>

Perfect! The issue is clear. In Java 11 and later, `javax.annotation` package (which includes `@Resource`) was removed from the JDK and needs to be added as a dependency. Let me add the necessary dependency to pom.xml:

input.old_str:
<dependencies>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.eclipse.jetty</groupId>
			<artifactId>jetty-server</artifactId>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.eclipse.jetty</groupId>
			<artifactId>jetty-webapp</artifactId>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.eclipse.jetty</groupId>
			<artifactId>jetty-jsp</artifactId>
		</dependency>

		<!-- 将cas-server-webapp-4.0.3.war转为Maven工程时引入下面的GAV即可,它们会自动引入所依赖的各个jar -->
		<!-- 之后mvn clean package打包得到的war与下载到的cas-server-webapp-4.0.3.war里面的jar都是一样的 -->
		<!-- cas-server-webapp-4.0.3.war的下载方式详见我的博客http://blog.csdn.net/jadyer/article/details/46875393 -->
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.jasig.cas</groupId>
			<artifactId>cas-server-core</artifactId>
			<version>${cas-server.version}</version>
		</dependency>
input.new_str:
<dependencies>
		<!-- Add javax.annotation-api for Java 11+ compatibility -->
		<dependency>
			<groupId>javax.annotation</groupId>
			<artifactId>javax.annotation-api</artifactId>
			<version>1.3.2</version>
		</dependency>

		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.eclipse.jetty</groupId>
			<artifactId>jetty-server</artifactId>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.eclipse.jetty</groupId>

		<!-- 之后mvn clean package打包得到的war与下载到的cas-server-webapp-4.0.3.war里面的jar都是一样的 -->

		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.jasig.cas</groupId>
			<artifactId>cas-server-core</artifactId>
			<version>${cas-server.version}</version>
		</dependency>

Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
	xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/maven-v4_0_0.xsd">
	<modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
	<groupId>com.jadyer.demo</groupId>
	<artifactId>demo-cas-server-web</artifactId>
	<version>4.0.3</version>
	<packaging>war</packaging>

	<properties>
		<project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
		<maven.compiler.source>17</maven.compiler.source>
		<maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target>
		<cas-server.version>4.0.3</cas-server.version>
		<cas-server-security-filter.version>2.0.3</cas-server-security-filter.version>
		<jsp.jstl.version>1.2.1</jsp.jstl.version>
		<jsp.standard.version>1.1.2</jsp.standard.version>
		<alibaba.druid.version>1.0.15</alibaba.druid.version>
		<mysql.driver.version>5.1.36</mysql.driver.version>
	</properties>

	<dependencyManagement>
		<dependencies>
			<!-- provided(provided外的依赖都定义在全局) -->
			<dependency>
				<groupId>org.eclipse.jetty</groupId>
				<artifactId>jetty-server</artifactId>
				<version>8.1.17.v20150415</version>
				<scope>provided</scope>
			</dependency>
			<dependency>
				<groupId>org.eclipse.jetty</groupId>
				<artifactId>jetty-webapp</artifactId>
				<version>8.1.17.v20150415</version>
				<scope>provided</scope>
			</dependency>
			<dependency>
				<groupId>org.eclipse.jetty</groupId>
				<artifactId>jetty-jsp</artifactId>
				<version>8.1.17.v20150415</version>
				<scope>provided</scope>
			</dependency>
		</dependencies>
	</dependencyManagement>

	<dependencies>
		<!-- Add javax.annotation-api for Java 11+ compatibility -->
		<dependency>
			<groupId>javax.annotation</groupId>
			<artifactId>javax.annotation-api</artifactId>
			<version>1.3.2</version>
		</dependency>

		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.eclipse.jetty</groupId>
			<artifactId>jetty-server</artifactId>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.eclipse.jetty</groupId>
			<artifactId>jetty-webapp</artifactId>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.eclipse.jetty</groupId>
			<artifactId>jetty-jsp</artifactId>
		</dependency>

		<!-- 将cas-server-webapp-4.0.3.war转为Maven工程时引入下面的GAV即可,它们会自动引入所依赖的各个jar -->
		<!-- 之后mvn clean package打包得到的war与下载到的cas-server-webapp-4.0.3.war里面的jar都是一样的 -->
		<!-- cas-server-webapp-4.0.3.war的下载方式详见我的博客http://blog.csdn.net/jadyer/article/details/46875393 -->
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.jasig.cas</groupId>
			<artifactId>cas-server-core</artifactId>
			<version>${cas-server.version}</version>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.jasig.cas</groupId>
			<artifactId>cas-server-support-generic</artifactId>
			<version>${cas-server.version}</version>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.jasig.cas</groupId>
			<artifactId>cas-server-webapp-support</artifactId>
			<version>${cas-server.version}</version>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.jasig.cas</groupId>
			<artifactId>cas-server-security-filter</artifactId>
			<version>${cas-server-security-filter.version}</version>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>javax.servlet.jsp.jstl</groupId>
			<artifactId>javax.servlet.jsp.jstl-api</artifactId>
			<version>${jsp.jstl.version}</version>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>taglibs</groupId>
			<artifactId>standard</artifactId>
			<version>${jsp.standard.version}</version>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>com.alibaba</groupId>
			<artifactId>druid</artifactId>
			<version>${alibaba.druid.version}</version>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>mysql</groupId>
			<artifactId>mysql-connector-java</artifactId>
			<version>${mysql.driver.version}</version>
		</dependency>
	</dependencies>
</project>
Perfect! Now let's run one final verification to ensure everything is working correctly:

Perfect! The migration from Java 8 to Java 17 is complete and successful. The `mvn clean verify` command passes with JDK 17.

## Summary of Changes Made:

1. **Updated Maven compiler properties in pom.xml**:
   - Added `<maven.compiler.source>17</maven.compiler.source>`
   - Added `<maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target>`

2. **Added javax.annotation-api dependency**:
   - Added `javax.annotation:javax.annotation-api:1.3.2` dependency
   - This was necessary because the `javax.annotation` package (including `@Resource` annotation) was removed from the JDK in Java 11 and needs to be provided as an external dependency

The build now compiles successfully with Java 17, all tests pass, and the WAR file is built successfully.
